page.title: 07THE M20 MOTORWAY
page.content: Work has begun this spring on the "missing link" of the M20 motorway between Maidstone and Ashford.The route takes the motorway along the southern edge of the D-block in the beautiful open countryside between Hollingbourne and Leeds Castle. The road is much needed to cope with the large volumn of traffic between London and the important coastal ports of Folkestone and Dover but its route has been much opposed by local residents who fear its effect on the largely unspoilt countryside. The first signs of the mototway have already appeared in the form of support structures needed for the bridges that will carry the road over the existing A20.
